translation.en: -Seat belts, everyone! -Please let this be a normal field trip.
translation.ko: 모두 안전벨트! 이번에는 평범한 체험 학습이길

translation.en: With the Friz? -[all] No way! -Aw!
♪ Cruisin' on down Main Street You're relaxed and feelin' good ♪
♪ Next thing that you know You're seein' ♪
♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
♪ Surfin' on a sound wave Swingin' through the stars ♪ Yee-ha!
♪ Take a left at your intestine Take your second right past Mars ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus Navigate a nostril ♪
-Achoo! -♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Jyoti] Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus Raft a river of lava ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus Such a fine thing to do! ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete You might get baked into a pie ♪
translation.ko: 이제 마지막으로 파이 속 탐험을 떠나

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus Step inside, it's a wilder ride! ♪
translation.ko: 스쿨버스를 타고 다 함께 마법의 세계로

translation.en: ♪ Come on! Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
Thank goodness! I was afraid of what I might find.
Something could've changed over the summer.
translation.ko: 여름 동안 변한 게 있을 수도 있잖아

translation.en: Nope, nothing different, except Jyoti, of course.
translation.ko: 아니, 아무것도 없어 여기 조티만 빼고

translation.en: Arnold's not big on change.
Everything's exactly like it was when we left last year.
translation.ko: 전부 작년의 그 모습 그대로 똑같네

translation.en: Welcome to your first day. I'll show you around.
translation.ko: 조티, 처음 온 걸 환영해 구경시켜 줄게

translation.en: Exciting.
But from what you guys said, I thought everything would be more magical.
translation.ko: 애들 말을 들어보니 신기한 게 있다고 하던데?

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. It will be. First, the normal stuff.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 곧 볼 테니 평범한 것부터 시작하자

translation.en: Like how everybody sits in the same place every class.
translation.ko: 우린 전부 수업마다 같은 자리에 앉아

translation.en: And how we all have jobs. It's a delicate balance.
translation.ko: 각자 할 일도 있지 아주 균형이 잘 맞아

translation.en: Wanda and DA handle the brain builders, and Ralphie annoys the skeleton.
translation.ko: 완다와 디에이는 두뇌 게임을 랄피는 해골 괴롭히기를 맡아

translation.en: Yeah, but he never gets rattled.
I handle the worrying for all of us.
translation.ko: 물론 난 모두를 걱정하는 일을 해

translation.en: Cool! It's like you have your own balanced ecosystem.
translation.ko: 멋지다, 꼭 너희만의 균형 잡힌 생태계 같네

translation.en: According to my research, you're right. An ecosystem is--
A community of plants and animals with roles to play.
translation.ko: 식물과 동물이 각자 역할을 하며 살아가는 공동체지

translation.en: -How'd you know that? -An old pizza box I left under my bed.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 알았어? - 침대 밑 피자 상자 덕이지

translation.en: My mom called it the world's smelliest biome. -Ugh. -[giggling]
Where do I fit in?
I bet we'll find out before the day's over.
translation.ko: 아직 몰라, 하지만 오늘 내로 알게 될걸

translation.en: You can have Phoebe's seat. She went back to her old school.
translation.ko: 피비가 쓰던 자리에 앉아 걘 옛날 학교로 돌아갔거든

translation.en: -There she is. -Get ready, everybody.
That's awesome.
Told ya! Now, get ready for the Friz and her mug in 14.2 seconds.
translation.ko: 그렇지? 이제 프리즐 선생님과 머그잔이 14.2초 후면 도착해

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle always gets here at exactly the same time, and puts her mug--
translation.ko: 선생님은 정확히 같은 시간에 오셔서, 머그잔을...

translation.en: -That we made for her. -In the exact same spot on her desk.
translation.ko: - 우리가 만들어 드린 거야! - 책상 위 같은 곳에 두시거든

translation.en: In three, two, one...
That's weird, one second late.
[kids] Ms. Frizzle!
-Hi, Miss-- -[gasps]
You're not Ms. Frizzle.
Oh, but I am, Arnold.
And may I just say, I'm so glad you didn't stay home today.
Hey, Tim! Love your artwork.
How was your summer at the animal rescue?
translation.ko: 완다, 여름 내내 동물 구조는 잘했니?

translation.en: Keesha, oh, love the outfit. Jyoti, welcome to your first day.
translation.ko: 키샤, 옷이 예쁘구나 조티, 처음 온 걸 환영해

translation.en: Ralphie, I see you had oatmeal this morning, you're wearing it.
translation.ko: 랄피, 아침에 오트밀 먹었구나? 옷에 묻었어

translation.en: Carlos, "iguana" say hi to you, too!
And, DA, according to your research, you must realize...
translation.ko: 디에이, 네 조사에 따라 분명 알고 있겠지?

translation.en: -[both] It's a different Frizzle. -[door opens]
translation.ko: - 난 다른 프리즐이지! - 다른 프리즐 선생님이군요!

translation.en: [kids gasp] Ms. Frizzle?
-Hey, Val. -Whoa. Total Frizzle overload.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 언니 - 프리즐 선생님이 너무 많아요!

translation.en: Actually, you can now call me Professor Frizzle, PhD.
translation.ko: 이젠 날 학술 박사 프리즐 교수님이라고 부르렴

translation.en: The first of many changes this year.
[stutters] Changes?
Class, please welcome your new science teacher,
and my little sister, Ms. Fiona Felicity Frizzle.
translation.ko: 내 동생인 피오나 펠리시티 프리즐 선생님이란다

translation.en: [both] What?
[both] What?
This can't be.
Now, where to put my special, magical, crazy-growing,
translation.ko: 자, 내 특별하고 신기하고 쑥쑥 잘 자라며

translation.en: must-stay-in-a-pot Crescit Leiunium Frizzlaeia vine?
translation.ko: 꼭 화분에만 둬야 하는 쑥쑥 프리즐 덩굴은 어디 두지?

translation.en: That's the question of the day. How about here?
-[gasps] -Yes! But, but, but...
So much to do today, kids. To the Bus!
translation.ko: 오늘 할 일이 참 많아 버스로 가자!

translation.en: New teacher or not, that plant does not belong in the special spot.
translation.ko: 새 선생님이라도 이 특별석에 화분을 둘 순 없지

translation.en: Class, my sensational sister will be taking over this year,
translation.ko: 얘들아, 올해부터는 내 멋진 동생이 맡아줄 거야

translation.en: with Liz's help, of course.
-But what about you? -[gasps]
As a research professor, I'll be traveling the universe.
translation.ko: 난 연구 교수로서 우주를 여행할 거야

translation.en: Traversing the ages, exploring quantum realities.
translation.ko: 시대를 가로질러 양자 현실을 탐험할 거란다

translation.en: Your basic fact-finding flummerydiddle.
translation.ko: 말이 안 되는 일의 사실을 조사하는 거지

translation.en: What about us? We need to be taking chances.
And making mistakes.
And getting messy!
Oh, don't you worry, you'll get plenty of that.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 충분히 할 수 있단다

translation.en: Bus, do your stuff.
Hmm. Something's missing. Wait.
Fiona, the keys.
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 뭔가가 빠졌네 - 피오나 열쇠 챙겨야지

translation.en: -Whoa, thanks, sis. -[honks]
Come along, everyone.
Awesome!
-[Ralphie] I wonder where we're going. -It's a mystery. Don't ya love it?
translation.ko: - 어디 가는 걸까? - 수수께끼야, 재밌지 않니?

translation.en: -All right! -Yay, a field trip.
Even my seat is different.
After it was all worked in and everything.
Seat belts, everyone!
-[sighs] -Surprising.
So many modes to choose from. But which one do we pick? Oh...
translation.ko: 여러 가지가 있는데 뭘 골라야 하지?

translation.en: Ah! Here we go.
All good, class?
I'm guessing you don't get motion sick much.
translation.ko: 넌 멀미를 별로 안 하나 보네

translation.en: -[thuds] -Ah! We're here! [kids] Wow!
Good. Because I cannot get off this bus fast enough--
translation.ko: 잘됐네요, 저는 당장 이 버스에서 내리고...

translation.en: Hang in there, Arnold.
I haven't lost a kid yet... this year.
translation.ko: 난 학생을 잃어버린 적이 없지 올해엔 말이야

translation.en: -[thuds] -Kidding or am I? You'll never know.
She may be new, but she knows how to work the wedgie-nator.
translation.ko: 새 선생님이지만 '팬티 들기 기계'는 쓸 줄 아시네

translation.en: She seems nice and everything, but I'm not sure about her parking skills.
translation.ko: 좋은 분인 것 같긴 한데 주차 실력은 잘 모르겠어

translation.en: How much do I love this bus?
-That was close. -[laughing]
[sighs] That was exciting.
Since we're here, wherever we are, we might as well look around, right?
Where are we anyway?
According to my research, we're in the Galapagos Islands.
translation.ko: 내 조사에 따르면 여긴 갈라파고스 제도야

translation.en: Fi-o-na! How you doin', gal?
[laughs] Galapagos Gil! What's up, bear-man?
translation.ko: 갈라파고스 길! 우리 곰돌이, 잘 지냈죠?

translation.en: -[both laugh] -They know each other?
Like the animals here,
the only place you find Galapagos Gil is the Galapagos Islands.
translation.ko: 갈라파고스 길은 갈라파고스 제도에서만 볼 수 있어

translation.en: I'm rarer than a screen door on a submarine.
translation.ko: 난 잠수함 칸막이 문보다도 더 희귀한 존재란다

translation.en: [laughs] Everything here lives in perfect balance.
translation.ko: 이곳에서는 모든 게 완벽한 균형을 이루며 살지

translation.en: Look at this way healthy, way special ecosystem.
translation.ko: 이 엄청나게 건강하고 엄청나게 특별한 생태계를 보렴

translation.en: You know, Ms. Frizzle, whenever we used to go on a trip,
translation.ko: 있잖아요, 선생님 체험 학습을 할 때면

translation.en: Professor Frizzle used to, how do I put this, enhance the experience.
translation.ko: 프리즐 교수님은... 뭐라고 해야 하나... 더 재밌게 해주셨어요

translation.en: -Ah, with sandwiches? -With magic!
You know, as my great-aunt Clair Voyant used to say, "I knew you were going to say that."
translation.ko: 신통방통 클레어 이모할머님 말마따나, '그 말 할 줄 알았지'

translation.en: She smelled like onions in the worst possible way.
translation.ko: 알싸한 양파 냄새가 코를 '탁!' 찌르는 분이셨어

translation.en: Hey!
Talk about a turtle surprise!
[kids] Carlos!
-Nice! -I have serious remote envy.
The glasses show you how the parts of the ecosystem fit together.
[Tim] Mushrooms point to grasshoppers, point to owls?
-What does that mean? -Follow Carlos and Wanda's arrows.
translation.ko: - 무슨 의미지? - 카를로스와 완다의 화살표를 봐

translation.en: [DA] Plants grow, tortoises eat the leaves,
translation.ko: 식물이 자라면 거북들이 그 잎을 먹고

translation.en: ticks bite the tortoises and finches eat the ticks.
translation.ko: 진드기는 그 거북을 물고 핀치가 그 진드기를 먹어

translation.en: These are actually... [gulps] pretty tasty.
The kid in me says, "Eww." The finch in me says, "Nom-nom-nom!"
Unexpected. Everything here is interconnected.
translation.ko: 의외네, 이곳의 모든 게 서로 연결돼 있어

translation.en: Ding-ding-ding! Nailed it, new kid.
Everything's got a role to play, and that keeps everything stable.
translation.ko: 저마다 역할이 있어서 그 덕에 균형을 유지하는 거야

translation.en: Since this is an island by itself in the middle of the ocean,
translation.ko: 이곳은 대양 한가운데 있는 외딴 섬이라서

translation.en: it has its own natural balance.
Come along, everyone.
-Uh, Ms. Frizzle? -[remote beeps] Can you change us back to--
Oh, I'm next.
Oh, I love this thing. Just say when.
translation.ko: 이거 재밌네 멈춰야 할 때 말하렴

translation.en: [both] When!
-Aw. -[Frizzle] Let's go!
Galapagos Gil, with everything in unison,
translation.ko: 갈라파고스 길 아저씨 이곳은 균형이 완벽한데

translation.en: don't you worry about something throwing that off?
You bet your giant tortoise we do. That's why we inspect everything.
translation.ko: 당연하지, 거북아 그래서 전부 검사하는 거란다

translation.en: You mean like luggage, coats, hats? Everything?
[Gil] Everything. So no new plants or animals get here.
translation.ko: 그래, 새로운 식물이나 동물이 들어오는 걸 막지

translation.en: -Accidents happen, you know. -Accidents?
translation.ko: - 돌발 상황이 생기기도 하거든 - 돌발 상황요?

translation.en: So you have to look at everything really close up?
-[gasps] Tim, what a great idea! -Oh, no!
Ooh! I love getting microscopic.
Magical! Majorly, majorly magical.
Sure, till we get eaten or baked into a pie.
translation.ko: 하지만 잡아먹히거나 파이가 될 수도 있어

translation.en: Let's explore, class. -Whoa! -Cool.
Hey, guys. How about we suit up to boot up?
Yeah, that's good.
I'm rock climbing on a boot.
Okay, look closely, everyone.
Anything could be an invasive species
that throws off the island's delicate balance.
translation.ko: 완벽한 균형을 깰 침입종이 될 수 있거든

translation.en: An invasive species is a plant or animal the island's not ready for?
translation.ko: 이 섬이 받아들이지 못하는 동식물을 침입종이라고 하나요?

translation.en: Yes to the guess from DA.
If things that already live here have no defense,
translation.ko: 여기 사는 생물에 방어 체계가 없다면

translation.en: the new species can take over and change everything.
translation.ko: 새로운 종이 그들을 제치고 모든 걸 바꿔버릴 수 있지!

translation.en: "And change everything..."
-Wow! This is absolutely-- -The reason they invented sneaker spray.
translation.ko: - 우와, 바로 이래서... - 운동화 스프레이가 필요한 거지

translation.en: Ugh! This guy's a walking cautionary tale.
He's been hiking in the woods back in his home country.
translation.ko: 고향에 있을 때 숲속에서 하이킹했나 봐요

translation.en: Let's hope there were no invasive hitchhikers.
We have insects.
Those look like insect eggs.
By Jyoti, you're right.
These eggs could mean the unwelcome arrival of a whole family of gypsy moths.
translation.ko: 이 알 때문에 의도치 않게 매미나방이 침입할 수 있지

translation.en: You don't want that. Here's what they can do.
translation.ko: 그러면 안 되죠 여기 그 결과가 보여요

translation.en: Here's before.
And here's after!
That poor ecosystem.
It was totally defenseless against the invasive species.
All that could happen because he didn't clean his--
translation.ko: 부츠를 닦지 않으면 그 모든 일이...

translation.en: Wow! Have you seen a dirtier boot? It's a banner ad for yuck!
translation.ko: 부츠를 닦지 않으면 그 모든 일이... 이 부츠 정말 더럽다! 역겨운 건 다 있네!

translation.en: Sorry.
What else is in those boots, sir?
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
I think so, but who would invest in a rocket-powered tortoise?
translation.ko: 아마도, 하지만 로켓 동력 거북을 누가 사겠어?

translation.en: No! I mean, that the new Ms. Frizzle keeps talking about invasive species
translation.ko: 아니, 내 말은 프리즐 선생님 자신이 침입종이라

translation.en: because she is one.
Relax. She's got a sense of humor. I can work with that.
translation.ko: 긴장 풀어, 재밌는 분이잖아 난 괜찮아

translation.en: Don't you get it? It's part of her plot.
Our classroom is a perfectly balanced ecosystem like these islands.
translation.ko: 우리 반은 이 섬처럼 완벽한 균형을 이룬 생태계였어

translation.en: We need to protect it.
What are you doing?
Oh, just protecting our ecosystem from an invasive teacher, that's all.
translation.ko: 아널드, 뭐 하는 거니? 침입 선생님으로부터 우리 생태계를 보호하는 것뿐이야

translation.en: Starting with her plant.
Hey! Actually, looks good on you. Sets off your shell.
translation.ko: 우와, 잘 어울리는데? 등껍질이 더 예뻐졌어

translation.en: All aboard, class. -Bus, undo your stuff. -[beeps]
translation.ko: 얘들아, 모두 타렴! 버스야, 행동 개시 취소!

translation.en: Ms. Friz, I mean, Professor Frizzle?
Hi, Arnold. Meet my new research assistant, Goldie.
translation.ko: 안녕, 아널드 나의 새로운 연구 조수 골디야

translation.en: What is it? Looks like a golden tamarin monkey. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 할 말 있니? - 금색 타마린 원숭이 같네요

translation.en: -I mean, what else is it? -I'm not sure how to say this, but...
translation.ko: - 아니, 어쩐 일인데? - 이걸 어떻게 말해야 할지...

translation.en: You need to come back!
What's the problem?
Your sister is nice and everything, but she's new.
translation.ko: 교수님 동생은 좋은 분이시지만 새로 오셨잖아요

translation.en: Yes?
And new things are always trouble.
It's like on the Galapagos.
Something new could totally upset their whole ecosystem.
translation.ko: 새로운 게 생태계 전체를 망가뜨릴 수도 있다고요

translation.en: True. Sometimes a new species can be a problem, but not always.
translation.ko: 맞아, 하지만 새로운 종이 늘 문제가 되는 건 아니란다

translation.en: -[bee buzzing] -Honeybees were new to North America.
translation.ko: 꿀벌도 북아메리카에 새로 왔을 때가 있었어

translation.en: But they became part of a new balance. No disasters at all, just yummy honey.
translation.ko: 하지만 새 균형을 이루어 무사히 맛있는 꿀을 만들었지

translation.en: So ecosystems always create a new balance over time, but it's not always bad.
translation.ko: 시간이 지나며 새 균형이 생기지만 그게 늘 나쁜 건 아니군요

translation.en: Sometimes it works out wonderfully, like with the honeybee.
But with invasive species, it's not so good.
I wish I knew how it will work out for our class.
translation.ko: 우리 반이 어떻게 될지 알고 싶어요

translation.en: Maybe a little magic will help you figure that out.
translation.ko: 약간의 마법을 부리면 알 수 있을 거야

translation.en: -Magic? -Runs in our family, you know.
Thanks, Ms. Frizzle. I mean, Professor Frizzle.
translation.ko: 감사해요, 프리즐 선생님 아니, 프리즐 교수님

translation.en: Hey, Arnold, one of my students hasn't adapted to the new teacher.
translation.ko: 아널드, 새 선생님께 적응 못 한 친구가 있다던데?

translation.en: I'm supposed to ask about magic.
But I don't see how that will help me see how things will work out.
translation.ko: 그걸로 미래 상황을 어떻게 안다는 건지 모르겠어요

translation.en: Let's go see.
Are you saying we should go ahead in time?
Like my time-traveling auntie Meridiem will say one day,
translation.ko: 시간 여행자 머리디움 이모가 언젠가 하실 말마따나

translation.en: "No better time to visit the future than the present!"
To the bus!
Cool. Salivating. -Just look at all that yummy tech. -[beeping]
translation.ko: 끝내준다! 군침 도는데? 저 맛있는 기계 좀 봐!

translation.en: I wanna go to this school 30 years in the future.
If I don't bring my grades up, I will be at this school 30 years in the future.
translation.ko: 성적을 올리지 못하면 30년 후에도 이 학교에 있을걸

translation.en: Look! It's Arnold Jr., Wanda Jr., Ralphie Jr., everybody junior.
translation.ko: 봐! 아널드, 완다 랄피의 아이야! 전부 다 있네?

translation.en: See, Arnold? The class's ecosystem has survived.
translation.ko: 봤지, 아널드? 우리 반 생태계는 살아남았어

translation.en: Nothing to worry about.
You're right. What a relief! I guess I was totally overreacting.
translation.ko: 그러네요, 안심이에요 제가 과민 반응했나 싶었거든요

translation.en: Guys, wanna see my project on the huge Galapagos crisis?
translation.ko: 얘들아, 갈라파고스 위기에 대처할 내 프로젝트 좀 볼래?

translation.en: Crisis in the Galapagos? What's she talking about?
Maybe we'd better find out.
-No, no, this can't be happening. -Arnold, are you okay?
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 이럴 순 없어! - 아널드, 괜찮니?

translation.en: That plant is growing everywhere.
[groans] I can barely see where we're going.
These poor islands.
-At least it couldn't get any worse. -Oh, no, it is worse.
translation.ko: - 적어도 더 나빠질 건 없겠는데? - 이런, 더 나빠졌어

translation.en: [Arnold screaming] No!
This is not good.
Bunnies. Adorable! Best thing ever.
-This is a "hare-raising" situation. -[chuckles]
translation.ko: 지금은 이 토끼가 문제가 된 상황인데?

translation.en: Galapagos Gil? Is that really you?
The second. You must be the Frizzle class.
My dad told me you might show up
translation.ko: 너희가 이때쯤 올 거라고 아버지께 들었단다

translation.en: And indeed we did.
So, what precipitated the profusion of this particularly perfidious plant?
translation.ko: 이 어마어마한 식물이 늘어나게 된 이유가 뭔가요?

translation.en: No one knows, but somehow it wound up on the islands
translation.ko: 아무도 몰라요 어쩐 일인지 이 섬에 들어와

translation.en: and threw off our ecosystem.
What's with all the bunnies?
Well, once the plant started taking over, they wanted to control the plants.
translation.ko: 식물이 이곳을 지배하자 그 상황을 통제해야만 했어

translation.en: So they brought in bunnies to eat them.
But there was nothing to control the bunnies.
Exactly! So now we have two invasive species instead of one.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그래서 결국 침입종이 두 종이나 생겼단다

translation.en: That plant is obviously a non-native invasive species, but what is it?
translation.ko: 식물이 외래종인 건 알겠는데 정확히 뭐죠?

translation.en: [gasps] I know exactly what it is.
That's the magical, crazy-growing, must-stay-in-a-pot-at-all-times
translation.ko: 이건 신기하고, 쑥쑥 잘 자라며 화분에만 둬야 하는

translation.en: Crescit Leiunium Frizzlaeia vine!
Like the one on your desk 30 years ago?
Exactly! Only how did it get here?
translation.ko: 맞아, 그런데 그게 여기 어떻게 왔지?

translation.en: Did I accidentally cause this?
translation.ko: 내 실수로 이런 일이 생긴 건가?

translation.en: That would have been a terrible thing to do.
-Um, I'm sure it's not that bad. -But it is, Arnold.
translation.ko: - 그렇게 심각하진 않을 거예요 - 아니야, 아널드

translation.en: This is a really big mistake. I'm supposed to lead by example.
translation.ko: 정말 큰 실수야 내가 본보기를 보여야 하는데

translation.en: [sobbing] And if it was my fault, I don't know what I'll do.
translation.ko: 정말 내 잘못이라면 어째야 할지 모르겠구나

translation.en: Um, it is an example. Of plants, growing like crazy.
translation.ko: 본보기가 됐어요 식물이 쑥쑥 자라는 걸 봤잖아요

translation.en: And taking over the islands.
Well, maybe I am an invasive species.
translation.ko: 이런, 아무래도 난 침입종인 것 같아

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't be here. Should I ask my sister to come back?
translation.ko: 여기 있으면 안 되겠어 언니한테 돌아오라고 할까?

translation.en: [stammers] I mean, you shouldn't take it so hard.
But still getting old Friz back? That would be amazing, huh?
translation.ko: 그래도 옛 선생님이 오신다면 좋긴 할 거예요

translation.en: [kids] Arnold, no! No!
That settles it. I'm calling Valerie right now.
-Val, did I catch you at a bad time? -No. What's up?
translation.ko: - 언니, 지금 통화할 수 있어? - 그럼, 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: Listen, I've really messed up. You see, what happened was--
translation.ko: 내가 일을 망쳤어 무슨 일이 있었냐면...

translation.en: Wait!
Um, can I talk to the professor, privately?
translation.ko: 교수님과 얘기 좀 해도 돼요? 둘이서요

translation.en: You got it!
Hi, Arnold, what's on your mind?
Ah, right.
That plant? It was my fault. I did it. I left it on the island.
translation.ko: 식물이 자란 건 제 잘못이에요 제가 두고 왔거든요

translation.en: Goodness. Why in the sky would you do that?
With that plant in place of your mug, it was too much.
translation.ko: 머그잔 자리에 화분을 두니 견딜 수 없었어요

translation.en: [sighs] I know I'm the guy who hates change, but I caused the biggest change ever.
translation.ko: 변화를 싫어하는 제가 엄청난 변화를 일으켰어요

translation.en: In the form of plants and bunnies. Can you help us fix this?
translation.ko: 식물과 토끼의 세상이 됐죠 교수님이 도와주실래요?

translation.en: Well, remember I said a little magic will help?
translation.ko: 마법을 부리면 도움이 될 거라고 했지?

translation.en: [gasp] Yes! That's it! Magic bunny-disappearing spray!
translation.ko: 맞다, 그렇지! 토끼 쫓기 마법 스프레이다!

translation.en: Uh, no.
Wait. The best way to stop an invasive species is not let it invade in the first place.
translation.ko: 참, 침입종을 막는 최고의 방법은 침입하지 않도록 하는 거죠?

translation.en: Exactly! Good thinking, Arnold. Ooh, maybe you'd better get back now.
translation.ko: 맞아! 잘 맞혔어, 아널드 이제 돌아가는 게 좋겠구나

translation.en: Arnold. Hey!
Ms. Frizzle, you didn't leave the plant here. I did.
translation.ko: 선생님, 화분을 두고 간 건 선생님이 아니라 저예요

translation.en: -[kids] What? -But I know how to fix it.
If we take it away before it causes trouble.
translation.ko: 문제가 생기기 전에 화분을 치우면 돼요

translation.en: -To the bus, Arnold? -To the bus!
I left it right over here.
Tortoise, wait up!
No!
-Hang on, Arnold! -[Carlos] We're coming to help you.
[Ralphie] Hang on, Arnold!
[Jyoti] It's okay, Arnold, we're coming!
Oh, now that was a mistake.
-[yelps] -[kids] Gotcha!
Plant going crazy!
Best class ever.
-Thanks, Ms. Frizzle. -Thank you, Arnold.
Because of you, the carefully balanced ecosystem here will stay balanced.
translation.ko: 네 덕에 정교한 생태계가 계속 균형을 이루게 됐어

translation.en: You know what, Mr. Perlstein? You're all right.
translation.ko: 이봐, 펄스타인 씨 넌 괜찮은 애야

translation.en: -You know what, Ms. Frizzle? So are you. -[chuckling]
[sighs] Good ol' familiar desk.
Good ol' familiar pencil case. Good ol' familiar orthopedic cushion.
And a new teacher. That is good new, like a honeybee.
translation.ko: 그리고 새 선생님이지 이건 꿀벌처럼 좋은 변화야

translation.en: Hmm. Now what should go where?
There you go. The place of honor.
[gasps] Perfect! Thank you, Arnold. And what's this?
Something I made. It's a pot with a motion sensor perimeter.
translation.ko: 제가 만들었어요 동작 센서가 달린 화분이죠

translation.en: That way, if this little guy gets roamy again, we'll know.
translation.ko: 이거면 식물이 없어졌을 때 바로 알 거예요

translation.en: The new kid just found her spot in the class ecosystem.
translation.ko: 벌써 우리 반 생태계에서 할 일을 찾은 것 같네

translation.en: I like it. New year, new teacher, new balance.
translation.ko: 멋지구나 새해, 새 선생님, 새 균형까지!

translation.en: You're going to have great new adventures, class.
translation.ko: 즐겁고 새로운 모험을 하게 될 거야

translation.en: I have one thing left to say to you.
translation.ko: 너희에게 한 가지 할 말이 남았단다

translation.en: -What could that be? -Wahoo!
Well, Goldie, our adventure begins.
Although I'm going to miss those kids, including--
-[phone ringing] -Arnold?
Hi, Professor Frizzle. Before you go, I had another question.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 교수님 가시기 전에 궁금한 게 있어요

translation.en: I know, "Why didn't you just stay home from school today?"
translation.ko: 알아, '오늘 왜 땡땡이를 안 쳤을까?' 그거지?

translation.en: Besides that.
Nature doesn't have fences to keep animals in their own ecosystems.
So, what's stopping one from invading all on its own?
Wild animals do roam free inside boundaries
translation.ko: 야생동물들은 바다나 산처럼 일정한 범위 안에서

translation.en: like oceans and mountains. But they like to stay
translation.ko: 자유롭게 돌아다니지 동물들은 자기가 살 수 있는 환경에 남길 좋아해

translation.en: in places that have what they need to survive.
translation.ko: 동물들은 자기가 살 수 있는 환경에 남길 좋아해

translation.en: Could be a small range, like one tiny island.
translation.ko: 작은 섬처럼 조그마한 범위일 수도 있고

translation.en: Or might be all the oceans in the world.
translation.ko: 세상의 모든 바다가 될 수도 있지

translation.en: Okay, so invasive species make a mess.
How do you fix it after the fact?
translation.ko: 만약 타임머신이 없다면 그 문제를 어떻게 해결하죠?

translation.en: It's hard to undo damage done.
What we can do is stop invasive species in the first place.
translation.ko: 애초에 침입종이 가지 않게 막는 게 방법이지

translation.en: Never set pets free in the wild.
And when you travel, be careful not to bring stowaways.
translation.ko: 여행할 땐, 동식물을 들여오지 않도록 조심하렴

translation.en: [Keesha] Arnold! Time for your audition.
Right! Just let me practice my line.
-Oink, oink. -Audition? Oink?
translation.ko: 꿀꿀 오디션? 꿀꿀? 너희 뭐 하고 있니?

translation.en: What are you up to now?
translation.ko: 오디션? 꿀꿀? 너희 뭐 하고 있니?

translation.en: Just a little surprise for next time. Where will you be, Professor Frizzle?
translation.ko: 다음을 위한 깜짝 선물이죠 교수님은 어디 가세요?

translation.en: Wherever the wind takes me, Arnold.
translation.ko: 난 바람이 이끄는 대로 갈 거란다

translation.en: Wherever the wind takes me!
